title: Movie App
description: An application that lets you search for movies by title. Powered by HTML, CSS and JQuery

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This is a simple work scheduler application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: This app takes in information about employees on a team, then generates an HTML webpage summary for each person.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather app that will run in the browser for giving local weather information for any city.

title: Readme Generator
description: This app can easily create a README file by using a command-line application in nodejs.

title: Code Quiz
description: A timed quiz on JavaScript fundamentals that stores high scores to gauge my progress compared to my peers
